name: Xylem
description:
Capt. Illary  (codename Capillary) has give out your orders. It's fall time, boys! 

After a brief descent from the clouds, it's up to you, Srgnt. Drizzle, to make your way through the treacherous terrain that is the Xylem and Phloem. 
Randevu at the canopy Sargent. GO!

All code and art was by me: Tohz

At the helm of the speakers is James, using the power of Plouge Chipsounds to get deep in them drums.
